checkuser-summary:
{{CheckUserForm}}
Explanation of CheckUser tool shown on [[Special:CheckUser]].

Parameters:
* $1 - an integer that can change based on wiki configuration. default value: 16
* $2 - an integer that can change based on wiki configuration. default value: 32
* $3 - the maximum number of results returned as set in the wiki global CheckUserMaximumRowCount. default value: 5000
checkuserlog:
{{doc-special|CheckUserLog}}
In this special page, checkusers can look at a log of past checkuser actions.
checkuser-contribs: [[File:Special-Contributions with the CheckUser extension loaded (2023).png|thumb|Example usage of this link text]]This is a link anchor used in [[Special:Contributions]]/''name'' to link to [[Special:CheckUser]] with ''name'' pre-filled in the form. Displayed only when the user has the ''checkuser'' right.
checkuser-contribs-log: This is a link anchor used in [[Special:Contributions]]/''name'' to link to recent entries in the CheckUser log regarding the user. Displayed only when user viewing the page has the right to view the CheckUser log ('''checkuser-log''' permission).
checkuser-contribs-log-initiator: This is a link anchor used in [[Special:Contributions]]/''name'' to link to recent check users made by this user. Displayed only when user viewing the page has the right to view the CheckUser log ('''checkuser-log''' permission).
checkuser-reason-api:
A prefix added to the user supplied reason for the check when the check is made using the API.

Parameters:
* $1 - User specified reason
{{Identical|API}}
checkuser-showlog: Text used as the label for a link to [[Special:CheckUserLog]] from [[Special:CheckUser]] which is shown in the subtitle. See also {{msg-mw|checkuser-showmain}}.
checkuser-query:
{{CheckUserForm}}
Text shown at the top of the form in [[Special:CheckUser]]. See [[mw:Extension:CheckUser#Basic_interface|screenshot titled 'Basic CheckUser interface']].
checkuser-target:
{{CheckUserForm}}
Used as a label for the field that a checkuser uses to specify the target for the check. This is required and include:
* Usernames
* IP addresses
* IP address ranges
* XFF IP addresses
{{Identical|IP address or username}}
checkuser-cidr-label: [[File:Checkuser find common range form ooui (example).png|thumb|Form where string is used with sample data.]]Used as the fieldset label for the CIDR calculator shown in [[Special:CheckUser]]. For an explanation of CIDR see [[WikiPedia:CIDR]].
checkuser-cidr-res: [[File:Checkuser find common range form ooui (example).png|thumb|Form where string is used with sample data.]]Label used for the disabled input that shows the result of the CIDR calculator. For an explanation of CIDR see [[WikiPedia:CIDR]].
checkuser-cidr-affected-ips: [[File:Checkuser find common range form ooui (example).png|thumb|Form where string is used with sample data.]]The prefix text for the number of affected IP addresses in the CheckUser CIDR form. For an explanation of CIDR see [[WikiPedia:CIDR]].
checkuser-cidr-too-small: The error message shown in the CIDR tool shown on Special:CheckUser when the calculated CIDR is too large.
checkuser-range-outside-limit: Used on Special:CheckUser if the range provided to run a check on is outside the allowed limit.
checkuser-empty: Used in [[Special:CheckUserLog]], if the CheckUser log shows no results.
checkuser-nomatch-edits:
Used in [[Special:CheckUser]] to indicate that no results were found with the user-supplied parameters that were submitted after pressing the button labelled by {{msg-mw|checkuser-check}}. This message also details the last date and time that a result was present under this target.

Parameters:
* $1 - date, localized
* $2 - time, localized
See also:
* {{msg-mw|Checkuser-nomatch}}
checkuser-check-this-user:
{{CheckUserLogForm}}
Label for a link shown as a subtitle link in [[Special:CheckUserLog]]. Only shown if the log filters for a particular target. Links to [[Special:CheckUser]] with the form pre-filled with the target that is currently filtered for. See also {{msg-mw|checkuser-investigate-this-user}}.
checkuser-investigate-this-user:
{{CheckUserLogForm}}
Label for a link shown as a subtitle link in [[Special:CheckUserLog]]. Only shown if the log filters for a particular target. Links to [[Special:Investigate]] with the form pre-filled with the target that is currently filtered for. See also {{msg-mw|checkuser-check-this-user}}.
checkuser-recent-checks: Text shown for a link to [[Special:CheckUserLog]] shown in the subtitle when a check has been performed.
checkuser-log-checks-by:
{{CheckUserLogForm}}
Tool link shown next to the performer of a check on [[Special:CheckUserLog]]. Links to the log for all checks made by that checkuser.
checkuser-log-checks-on:
{{CheckUserLogForm}}
Tool link shown next to the target of a check on [[Special:CheckUserLog]]. Links to the log of all checks performed on that target.
checkuser-locked:
Used to indicate that a user shown in the results is locked in [[Special:CheckUser]].
{{Identical|Locked}}
checkuser-localonly:
{{CheckUserGetEdits}}
Used to indicate that an account local-only and has no central account in [[Special:CheckUser]] results.
checkuser-massblock-text:
{{CheckUserGetUsersBlockForm}}
Used as intro text for the form {{msg-mw|checkuser-massblock}}.
checkuser-centralauth-multilock:
Label of link to Special:MultiLock shown on Special:CheckUser's block form.

Cf. {{msg-mw|multilock}}.
checkuser-noreason: Error message shown on [[Special:CheckUser]] when the user has provided no reason for the check and the wiki configuration requires a reason for the check.
checkuser-too-many:
Used in [[Special:CheckUser]].

This message is followed by a list of IPs that have edits.

If the number of IPs also exceeds the limit, the following message is shown:
* {{msg-mw|checkuser-limited}}

Parameters:
* $1 - the maximum number of results
checkuser-target-nonexistent: Used as error message in [[Special:CheckUserLog]] to indicate that the target being filtered for does not exist.
checkuser-initiator-nonexistent:
Used as error message in [[Special:CheckUserLog]] to indicate that the username entered in the {{msg-mw|checkuser-log-search-initiator}} field does not exist.

"Initiator" is {{msg-mw|checkuser-log-search-initiator}} without the colon.
checkuser-search:
{{CheckUserLogForm}}
Title of the form shown on [[Special:CheckUserLog]] that can filter the log entries shown. See screenshot of "[[mw:Extension:CheckUser#Basic_interface|an example log page]]
checkuser-search-initiator:
This message is an option in a radio button on the search form for the checkuser log.

See screenshot "[[mw:Extension:CheckUser#Basic_interface|Example log]]".

Initiator means the CheckUser who checks someone's information.
{{Identical|Initiator}}
checkuser-search-target:
This message is used in an option in a radio button on the search form for the checkuser log. The target of the check means the user which was checked.
{{Identical|Target}}
checkuser-log-search-type: Label of form field on Special:CheckUserLog's search form. This corresponds to the radio buttons for the search type. See {{msg-mw|checkuser-search-initiator}} and {{msg-mw|checkuser-log-search-target}}.
checkuser-ipeditcount:
This information is shown on the result page of [[mw:Extension:CheckUser#Basic_interface|basic CheckUser interface]] on [[Special:CheckUser]] when doing the ''{{int:Checkuser-ips}}'' check), next to the individual listed IPs. Its appearance is similar to that of edit summaries.

This is only shown if the estimate of the total number of edits from the respective IP is larger than the total number of edits made by this account on that IP.

[[File:CheckUser3.png|thumb|screenshot]]

Parameters:
* $1 - an estimate of the total number of edits from the respective IP (i.e. the number of edits by all users, not only by the requested user).
checkuser-showmain: Link label on Special:CheckUserLog's subtitle. Links to Special:CheckUser. See also {{msg-mw|checkuser-showlog}}.
checkuser-show-investigate: Link label on Special:CheckUserLog's subtitle. Links to Special:Investigate. See also {{msg-mw|checkuser-showmain}}.
checkuser-limited: A message shown above CheckUser results if the result list would be longer than the specified limit (5000 entries), and has been truncated.
checkuser-log-entry-userips:
{{CheckUserLogForm}}
This is an entry in [[Special:CheckUserLog]] when a checkuser checks what IP addresses a user has used to edit.

Parameters:
* $1 - the user who did the check
* $2 - the user that was checked, with links to talk page, contributions, and block (like this: [[User:Username|Username]] ( [[User talk|Talk]] | [[Special:Contributions/Username|contribs]] | [[Special:Blockip|block]]) )
* $3 - a formatted timestamp of the event
* $4 - a formatted date of the event
* $5 - a formatted time of the event

See screenshot "[[mw:Extension:CheckUser#Basic_interface|Example log]]".
{{Related|Checkuser-log}}
checkuser-log-entry-ipedits:
{{CheckUserLogForm}}
This is an entry in the checkuser log when a checkuser checks which edits have been done from an IP address.

Parameters:
* $1 - the user who did the check
* $2 - the IP address that was checked
* $3 - a formatted timestamp of the event
* $4 - a formatted date of the event
* $5 - a formatted time of the event

See screenshot "[[mw:Extension:CheckUser#Basic_interface|Example log]]".
{{Related|Checkuser-log}}
checkuser-log-entry-ipusers:
{{CheckUserLogForm}}
This is an entry in the checkuser log when a checkuser checks which users have used an IP address.

Parameters:
* $1 - the user who did the check
* $2 - the IP address
* $3 - formatted timestamp of the log
* $4 - a formatted date of the event
* $5 - a formatted time of the event

See screenshot "[[mw:Extension:CheckUser#Basic_interface|Example log]]".
{{Related|Checkuser-log}}
checkuser-log-entry-ipedits-xff:
{{CheckUserLogForm}}
This is an entry in the checkuser log when a checkuser checks which edits have been done from an XFF IP address (XFF means X-Forwarded-For. Some providers use proxies to forward user requests. This effectively means anonymization of requests. To make the requesting user identifiable again, the original requesting IP is transmitted in a separate HTTP header, the XFF header.).

Parameters:
* $1 - the user who did the check
* $2 - the IP address that was checked
* $3 - a formatted timestamp of the event
* $4 - a formatted date of the event
* $5 - a formatted time of the event

See screenshot "[[mw:Extension:CheckUser#Basic_interface|Example log]]".
{{Related|Checkuser-log}}
checkuser-log-entry-ipusers-xff:
{{CheckUserLogForm}}
This is an entry in the checkuser log when a checkuser checks which users have used an XFF IP address (XFF means X-Forwarded-For. Some providers use proxies to forward user requests. This effectively means anonymization of requests. To make the requesting user identifiable again, the original requesting IP is transmitted in a separate HTTP header, the XFF header.).

Parameters:
* $1 - the user who did the check
* $2 - the IP address
* $3 - a formatted timestamp of the event
* $4 - a formatted date of the event
* $5 - a formatted time of the event

See screenshot "[[mw:Extension:CheckUser#Basic_interface|Example log]]".
{{Related|Checkuser-log}}
checkuser-log-entry-useredits:
{{CheckUserLogForm}}
This is an entry in the checkuser log when a checkuser checks which edits have been done from an IP address.

Parameters:
* $1 - name of checkuser
* $2 - name of user whose edits were inspected
* $3 - a formatted timestamp of the event
* $4 - a formatted date of the event
* $5 - a formatted time of the event

See screenshot "[[mw:Extension:CheckUser#Basic_interface|Example log]]".
{{Related|Checkuser-log}}
checkuser-log-entry-investigate:
{{CheckUserLogForm}}
This is an entry in the checkuser log when a checkuser investigates a target using [[Special:Investigate]].

Parameters:
* $1 - name of checkuser
* $2 - name of target
* $3 - a formatted timestamp of the event
* $4 - a formatted date of the event
* $5 - a formatted time of the event

{{Related|Checkuser-log}}
checkuser-autocreate-action: Details that a user was automatically created by CentralAuth. Shown in the [[Special:CheckUser]] {{msg-mw|checkuser-actions}} results and [[Special:Investigate]] timeline.
checkuser-create-action: Indicates creation of the user. Shown in the [[Special:CheckUser]] {{msg-mw|checkuser-actions}} results and [[Special:Investigate]] timeline.
checkuser-email-action:
Logged text when a user sends an e-mail. Proceeded by the user who sent the email. Shown in the [[Special:CheckUser]] {{msg-mw|checkuser-actions}} results and [[Special:Investigate]] timeline tab.

Parameters:
* $1 - a salted MD5 hash for the user an email was sent to
checkuser-reset-action:
Logged text when a user resets a password. Parameters:
* $1 - the username for which the password was reset. Can be used for GENDER.
checkuser-token-fail: Error message shown on [[Special:CheckUser]] when the CSRF token does not match the current session.
checkuser-login-failure: Log entry shown in CheckUser logs for failed login attempts. Shown in the [[Special:CheckUser]] {{msg-mw|checkuser-actions}} results and [[Special:Investigate]] timeline.
checkuser-login-success: Log entry shown in CheckUser logs for successful login attempts. Shown in the [[Special:CheckUser]] {{msg-mw|checkuser-actions}} results and [[Special:Investigate]] timeline.
checkuser-link-investigate-label: Label for a link to [[Special:Investigate]] from [[Special:CheckUser]].
checkuser-investigateblock-target:
{{InvestigateBlockForm}}
Label for a section of the form on [[Special:InvestigateBlock]]
checkuser-investigateblock-actions:
{{InvestigateBlockForm}}
Label for a section of the form on [[Special:InvestigateBlock]]
checkuser-investigateblock-options:
{{InvestigateBlockForm}}
Label for a section of the form on [[Special:InvestigateBlock]]
checkuser-investigateblock-email-label:
{{InvestigateBlockForm}}
Label for a checkbox in the [[Special:InvestigateBlock]] form
checkuser-investigateblock-usertalk-labe:
{{InvestigateBlockForm}}
Label for a checkbox in the [[Special:InvestigateBlock]] form
checkuser-investigateblock-reblock-label:
{{InvestigateBlockForm}}
Label for a checkbox in the [[Special:InvestigateBlock]] form
checkuser-investigateblock-notice-user-p:
{{InvestigateBlockForm}}
Label for a checkbox in the [[Special:InvestigateBlock]] form
checkuser-investigateblock-notice-talk-p:
{{InvestigateBlockForm}}
Label for a checkbox in the [[Special:InvestigateBlock]] form
checkuser-investigateblock-notice-positi:
{{InvestigateBlockForm}}
Label for a select widget in the [[Special:InvestigateBlock]] form
checkuser-investigateblock-notice-text-l:
{{InvestigateBlockForm}}
Label for a select widget in the [[Special:InvestigateBlock]] form
checkuser-investigateblock-notice-append:
{{InvestigateBlockForm}}
Label for an option in a select widget in the [[Special:InvestigateBlock]] form
checkuser-investigateblock-notice-prepen:
{{InvestigateBlockForm}}
Label for an option in a select widget in the [[Special:InvestigateBlock]] form
checkuser-investigateblock-notice-replac:
{{InvestigateBlockForm}}
Label for an option in a select widget in the [[Special:InvestigateBlock]] form
checkuser-investigateblock-failure: Message shown after submitting the [[Special:InvestigateBlock]] form if no blocks were made
checkuser-investigateblock-success: Message shown after submitting the [[Special:InvestigateBlock]] form if blocks were made
checkuser-investigateblock-notices-faile: Message shown after submitting the [[Special:InvestigateBlock]] form if blocks were made but notices were not added
checkuser-investigate:
{{doc-special|Investigate}}
The special page is an alternative version of [[Special:CheckUser]].
checkuser-investigate-page-subtitle:
Used as the page subtitle displaying the users under investigation.

Parameters:
* $1 - a list of usernames selected for the investigation
checkuser-investigate-subtitle-continue-:
Label for a button linking to [[Special:InvestigateBlock]].
{{identical|Continue}}
checkuser-investigate-subtitle-show-chec: Label for a button linking to [[Special:CheckUser]].
checkuser-investigate-indicator-new-inve: Label for a button linking to [[Special:Investigate]].
checkuser-investigate-indicator-logs: Label for a button linking to [[Special:CheckUserLog]].
checkuser-investigate-notice-no-results: Message shown in [[Special:Investigate]] when there are no results for an Account information investigation.
checkuser-investigate-tab-preliminary-ch: Label for the Account information tab.
checkuser-investigate-tab-compare: Label for the IPs & User agents tab.
checkuser-investigate-targets-label: Label for a field in the [[Special:Investigate]] search form.
checkuser-investigate-targets-placeholde: Placeholder text for a field in the [[Special:Investigate]] search form.
checkuser-investigate-duration-label: Label for a field in the [[Special:Investigate]] form.
checkuser-investigate-duration-option-al: Option in the duration field on [[Special:Investigate]]
checkuser-investigate-duration-option-1w: Option in the duration field on [[Special:Investigate]]
checkuser-investigate-duration-option-2w: Option in the duration field on [[Special:Investigate]]
checkuser-investigate-duration-option-30: Option in the duration field on [[Special:Investigate]]
checkuser-investigate-reason-label: Label for a field in the [[Special:Investigate]] search form.
checkuser-investigate-preliminary-table-: Entry for a table cell in [[Special:Investigate]].

Entry for a table cell in [[Special:Investigate]].

Parameters:
* $1 - total number of edits by the user on the respective wiki
Entry for a table cell in [[Special:Investigate]].
Label for a table header in [[Special:Investigate]].

Label for a table header in [[Special:Investigate]].

{{identical|Edit}}
Label for a table header in [[Special:Investigate]].
Label for a table header in [[Special:Investigate]].
Label for a table header in [[Special:Investigate]].
Entry for a table cell in [[Special:Investigate]].
checkuser-investigate-filters-legend: Heading for the filters form on [[Special:Investigate]].
checkuser-investigate-filters-exclude-ta: Label for the hide targets filter on [[Special:Investigate]].
checkuser-investigate-timeline-notice-no: Message shown in [[Special:Investigate]] when there are no results for a Timeline investigation.
Message shown in [[Special:Investigate]] when there are no results for a Timeline investigation that has filters.
checkuser-investigate-compare-toollinks-:
IP Check tool link. Label for an option in a dropdown list.

See also {{msg-mw|checkuser-investigate-compare-toollinks}}
checkuser-investigate-compare-notice-exc:
Warning shown in [[Special:Investigate]].

Parameters:
* $1 - invalid usernames
checkuser-investigate-compare-notice-no-: Message shown in [[Special:Investigate]] when there are no results for an IPs & User agents investigation.
Message shown in [[Special:Investigate]] when there are no results for an IPs & User agents investigation that has filters.
checkuser-investigate-compare-table-butt: Label for a button inside a table cell in [[Special:Investigate]]
Label for a button inside a table cell in [[Special:Investigate]]
Label for a button inside a table cell in [[Special:Investigate]]
Label for a button inside a table cell in [[Special:Investigate]]

Label for a button inside a table cell in [[Special:Investigate]].

{{Identical|Contributions}}
Label for a button inside a table cell in [[Special:Investigate]]
checkuser-investigate-compare-table-cell:
Entry for a table cell in [[Special:Investigate]]. Refers to an unregistered user. Shown in a table like this:

{| class="wikitable"
|-
! Username !! IP
|-
| UserA || 1.2.3.4
|-
| UserB || 1.2.3.5
|-
| Unregistered || 1.2.3.6
|-
| UserC || 1.2.3.7
|}

Entry for a table cell in [[Special:Investigate]].

Parameters:
* $1 - total number of edits and actions by a registered user from the respective IP and User Agent

Entry for a table cell in [[Special:Investigate]].

Parameters:
* $1 - total number of edits and actions from the respective IP
checkuser-investigate-compare-table-head: Label for a table header in [[Special:Investigate]].
Label for a table header in [[Special:Investigate]].
Label for a table header in [[Special:Investigate]].
Label for a table header in [[Special:Investigate]].
checkuser-investigate-subtitle-link-rest: Text for the link in the subtitle of [[Special:Investigate]] that will restart the guided tour.
checkuser-investigate-tour-targets-title: Title of targets step in the investigate form guided tour.
checkuser-investigate-tour-targets-desc:
Description of targets step in the investigate form guided tour.

Parameters:
* $1 - number of targets allowed on the [[Special:Investigate]] form.
checkuser-investigate-tour-useragents-ti: Title of useragents step in investigate guided tour.
checkuser-investigate-tour-useragents-de: Description of useragents step in investigate guided tour.
checkuser-investigate-tour-addusertarget: Title of addusertargets step in investigate guided tour.
Description of addusertargets step in investigate guided tour.
checkuser-investigate-tour-filterip-titl: [[File:Screenshot of Special-Investigate Guided Tour - Filter.png|thumb|Form where string is used in English.]] Title of filterip step in investigate guided tour.
checkuser-investigate-tour-filterip-desc:
[[File:Screenshot of Special-Investigate Guided Tour - Filter.png|thumb|Form where string is used in English.]]
Description of filterip step in investigate guided tour. The title of "Filters panel" is {{msg-mw|Checkuser-investigate-filters-legend}}.
checkuser-investigate-tour-block-title: Title of block step in investigate guided tour.
checkuser-investigate-tour-block-desc: Description of block step in investigate guided tour.
